name: MITT Preferred Corp.
description: MITT Preferred Corp. is a real estate investment trust (REIT) that focuses on investing in and managing a diversified portfolio of residential mortgage-backed securities (RMBS). The company is a subsidiary of MITT, which was founded to provide investors with a way to gain exposure to the real estate market through a tax-efficient structure. MITT Preferred Corp. aims to deliver attractive risk-adjusted returns through its investments in high-quality, income-generating assets. The company primarily invests in agency and non-agency RMBS, which are backed by residential mortgages. With a strong management team that possesses extensive experience in the real estate and finance sectors, MITT Preferred Corp. is committed to maintaining a disciplined investment approach and optimizing its portfolio. The company also emphasizes prudent risk management practices to navigate the complexities of the mortgage market. As part of its strategy, MITT Preferred Corp. focuses on leveraging market opportunities to enhance shareholder value while adhering to its investment guidelines. With the ongoing evolution of the housing market and interest rate conditions, MITT Preferred Corp. is well-positioned to capitalize on trends that may benefit its portfolio and deliver consistent income to its investors.

seo.meta_title: MITT Preferred Corp. | Real Estate Investment Trust
seo.meta_description: Explore MITT Preferred Corp., a leading REIT focused on mortgage-backed securities. Learn about our investment strategies and portfolio management.

faq.question: What does MITT Preferred Corp. do?
faq.answer: MITT Preferred Corp. is a real estate investment trust that invests in residential mortgage-backed securities.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of MITT Preferred Corp.?
faq.answer: David Lichtenstein is the CEO of MITT Preferred Corp.

faq.question: Where is MITT Preferred Corp. headquartered?
faq.answer: MITT Preferred Corp. is headquartered in New York, New York, USA.

faq.question: What types of securities does MITT Preferred Corp. invest in?
faq.answer: MITT Preferred Corp. primarily invests in agency and non-agency mortgage-backed securities.

faq.question: When was MITT Preferred Corp. founded?
faq.answer: MITT Preferred Corp. was founded in 2014.
